title: Repeat experiment with double initial speed

content.prompt: The student repeats the whole experiment but doubles the initial speed vi of the cart with mass m1 for each data point collected. When the new data points are plotted and a best-fit line is drawn, how would the slope of this best-fit line compare to the slope on the original graph?

choices.label: The slope would stay the same.
The slope would be one-half as great.
The slope would be one-quarter as great.
The slope would be twice as great.
The slope would be four times as great.

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
